channel.title: The REAL private server creator is forgotten
channel.description:
So, if i say the word Winterlove, you understand who i mean? I bet 1% of this community knows. He's forgotten! No-one ever gave him any credit. After a thread of your own server:
Credits: Me Person 1 for helping npc's.. person 2 for attacking
Where's winterlove?? HE made the private servers! Only (at kaitnieks) the first 3-4 servers gave him credit, but then...maybe every server owner should give him credit? he would really appriciate that ;)

item.title: The REAL private server creator is forgotten

item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

i gave im credit when i first started…

Read full topic

item.title: The REAL private server creator is forgotten
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

l3etal3lade:

I gave him credit on whitescape.net I also have his original unpatched source with his notes in it saying that the servers were never inteded to be used as a public thing for you and you alone :…

Thats really nice!

Read full topic
